kulami.game

Interface GameObservable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game

    public interface GameObservable
    The GameObservable interface defines the methods that the Game class must implement for GameObservers.
    Author:
    gordon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board getBoard()
      Returns a reference to the Board.
      DisplayFlags getDisplayFlags()
      Returns a reference to the DisplayFlags object.
      Pos getLastMove()
      Returns the position of the last move.
      java.util.List<Pos> getLegalMoves()
      Returns a list of all currently legal moves.
      Marbles getMarbles()
      Returns a reference to the Marbles object.
      java.util.List<Owner> getPanelOwners()
      Returns a List of length 100 containing the Owners of the Panels that each corresponding field currently belongs to.
      void registerObserver(GameObserver observer)
      Register a new GameObserver.
      void removeObserver(GameObserver observer)
      Remove a GameObserver.
